import ButtonGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ButtonGroup'; import Dropdown from 'react-bootstrap/Dropdown'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav'; import Navbar from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar'; import React, { useContext } from 'react' import Context from '../Contenxt' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import logoN from "../assets/img/logoN.png" import img5 from "../assets/img/img5.jpg" const NavBar = () => { const{buscador, setBuscador, setAuth} = useContext (Context); const seacher = (e) => { setBuscador(e.target.value) console.log (e.target.value) } const logout = () => setAuth (null) return ( <>

) } export default NavBar
